name: sitecache-manager
description: SiteCache Manager - File caching and management for LucidLink

scripts.dev:services: docker compose up postgres redis elasticsearch varnish-stats
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans
scripts.clean:images: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml down --rmi all

author: Your Organization
